about.title: About Me

australia.title: Life in Australia
australia.description: Moved to Adelaide in March 2025, starting a new journey as a tech migrant. Here, while adapting to the new living environment, I actively contribute to open source projects, hoping to find a new job in Australia and quickly integrate into Australian life.

visa.title: Visa Status
visa.description: Same as the primary visa holder (500 visa), as a PhD accompanying visa, there are no work hour restrictions and I can work full-time (verified in Seek Pass)
visa.additional: After PhD graduation, there will be an additional 3-year work visa as accompanying spouse. Theoretically, I can work full-time without employer sponsorship until 2033. If I successfully find employment, working for this duration should qualify me for Permanent Residency (PR).

about.regards: Looking forward to collaborating with you!
